header.name: Offhand Torches RTX
header.description:
An addon that replaces vanilla torches with custom torches that can be held in the offhand.
Created by ItsDrCat and MADLAD3718!

modules.description: Offhand Torches RTX Script API Code

settings.text: In Item Replacement mode, the addon with check through player's inventories for when they've picked up a vanilla torch, replacing it with a custom one.

In Block Replacement mode, the addon will search though all chunks surrounding each player, replacing vanilla torches with custom ones if it finds any. Torches that already existed in the world or were generated in vanilla structures will be replaced with custom ones automatically. Keep in mind that this mode has a small effect on server performance.
